snippet: A federal judge refused to dismiss an antitrust lawsuit involving 11 private equity firms. | Long after the I.P.O., private equity firms can continue to collect cash from portfolio companies. | SandRidge Energy reaches a deal with TPG-Axon Capital...
abstract: A federal judge refused to dismiss an antitrust lawsuit involving 11 private equity firms. | Long after the I.P.O., private equity firms can continue to collect cash from portfolio companies. | SandRidge Energy reaches a deal with TPG-Axon Capital Management. | Jamie Dimon was among those invited to the White House to discuss cybersecurity.

headline.main: Private Equity Antitrust Lawsuit Goes Forward
